system.description:
When you select this archetype at 2nd Level, you gain proficiency with the herbalism kit and the poisoner’s kit. If you are already proficient with either one, you gain an expertise die on checks with it.

In addition, you can create an antitoxin using only 1 rare herb and a greater healing potion using only 2 rare herbs, and you have no chance to accidentally poison yourself when using a poisoner’s kit to harvest poison from surrounding flora.
system.prerequisite: Level 2 Witch Class; Rustic Witch archetype
